text.one: I am a junior Front-End developer with solid foundation, I am living in Giza, Egypt, I finished my military service at December 2022
text.two: Every sence i was teenager, I was interested in computer science especially programming, Finally, in 2022 i decided to start my new career path and become a front-end developer.
text.three: My adventure started with a courses organised by myself,I learned on the internet, I learned the basics and some more advanced programming topics such as JavaScript. Then I started an additional course at Vue.js and React.js.
text.four: There I learned more about solving complex problems and overcoming challenges by working with Vue.js/Nuxtjs, Pinia, Vuetify, React.js and Redux. I continue to refine my path with myself, where my current focus points are Next.js
text.five: I Took my first step in my carreer as a Frontend develop (internship) in solution plus for 4 months.
text.six: Privately, I am interested in technological innovations, I am constantly trying to develop and broaden my horizons, I am eager to learn new things and take on challenges, I never give up and always strive to achieve my current goals, I am an open, friendly person with a strong character.

text.one: I learned Html and Css as a Template languages.
text.two: I learned JavaScript, TypeScript and Python as a programming languages,
text.three: Reactjs and Vuejs/Nuxt.js as a javeScript frameworks
text.four: I learned plugins like bootstrap, Sass, Pugjs, Gulpjs, Jestjs, Vee-validate, I18n, Axios
text.six: And some skills like Postman, Git, Github, Commanline, OOP, Data structure, Algorithm, Canvas 2d, Problem solvong and Responsive web
